QuestData.Title: Unleash The Yeti!
QuestData.Description: Your yeti ride gave me an idea. The Ook of Dook has a pet yeti he named Chomp Chomp.$b$bHe uses this yeti to scare other hozen in to making him the leader hozen. We need to get rid of that yeti.$b$bGo to Dooker Dome northwest of here and defeat some of the Cagemasters so Chomp Chomp is not tied up as much.$b$bYakshoe and I will meet you there with lots of incense and a dirty yak.
QuestData.CompletionText: We found a yak. Did you take out some hozen?
